planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, faceup/facedown contact)
action: If bounty slots are full, buy a gear card. Otherwise, buy a bounty card, even if at a navpoint
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, faceup contact)
c. Reveal the facedown contact of the lowest class on this planet.
d. Spend credits 8 000 to gain 1 fame.
special: If not all crew slots are full, gain the crew that matches a faceup contact of the lowest class on this planet for free.
